ComicInfo.Summary: It's a gruesome business, but it's a living. HEADHUNTERS are superhuman trackers whose job is to hunt down the ogres of the underworld; the inhuman freak cases the cops can't handle. But can the HEADHUNTERS handle the demonic Army of Wrath and their threat of nuclear holocaust? Writer/artist Chris Marrinan offers a twisted take on the crime fighting genre!
